revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Magic Ball |image = [[File:Magic_BallSprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Magic Ball''. |dex = 20 |effect = Gives a bonus to your catch rate }}
The '''Magic Ball''' is a type of Oak item. It gives a bonus to the player's catch rate.
==Details== ===Description=== Gives a bonus to your catch rate
===Acquisition=== Catch 20 Unique Pokémon.
== Trivia == * The artwork of the Magic Ball shares it's design with the premier Ball form the official games.

{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Magic Ball |image = [[File:Magic_BallSprite.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Magic Ball''. |Dex needed = 20 |Effect = Gives a bonus to your catch rate }}
